website_summaries.verdict: Basic gift bags that are practical and affordable. Adorn them with bows, tags, stickers, and more to fit any gift-worthy occasion.
pros: Generous pack of 25 bags for an affordable price
Available in several colors that you can match to specific occasions and holidays
A good value, especially for gift-giving to multiple recipients
cons: Not fancy, but you can decorate them any way you like
Won't hold large gifts, but the size is practical

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bags!
customer_reviews.text: I used these as welcome gift bags for our destination wedding and everyone loved them. They fit lots of goodies and they are nice quality. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: diosarc84

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking, Durable, Reusable, Eco Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for gifts with minimal packaging. If the receiver oesn't wnat to keep the bag, I shamelessly reclaim it for future use. My wrapping paper days are over as I attempt to make a smaller footprint on the environment. Putting the glitz into the gift, not the wrap. These are deep-colored and durable. Very durable. I have one bag from a party that all the guest signed. It's back in my gift wrap drawer to be used and re-signed when this group gathers again for a celebration. A whimsical reminder of fun and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Karenon2

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bags!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are very sturdy & well made! If you need bags in bulk, they're a wonderful price!! Bought the orange, they do have faint stripes on them but to me, it made them look even better than just being a solid color! Would most certainly buy again!
customer_reviews.author: BookJunkie

customer_reviews.title: but other than that they were great. A great price too
customer_reviews.text: They weren't the glossy black shown in the picture, but other than that they were great. A great price too. But I think the pic should be changed to reflect a more accurate representation. I really needed them to be slick black and they were more or a dusty brownish, black.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, great price.
customer_reviews.text: These bags were a darker red than the picture indicated but otherwise they were everything the producer said they would be: sturdy, good size, meeting most gift needs at a great price. The bags were needed somewhat last minute, and they came through in more than enough time. Thank you for a good product. Will be back if I ever need more again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done
customer_reviews.text: I needed a large quantity of gift bags in a pinch so I went with these. For the most part they held up, one had a small hole upon arrival but other than that they did the job. I don’t think I could have found bags anywhere else for less that $1/piece.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and hold a lot!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size. They're study and they hold a lot of items. Exactly what I needed and since they're black I can spruce them up with white chalk paint and fancy colored tissue paper. Good for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Graves

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: If you're after something that looks good and is more robust, keep browsing. PASS. We returned these.
customer_reviews.author: samd13

customer_reviews.title: Versatile bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags were okay quality, but fell apart pretty quickly. For thr price, however, it was a fairly good deal. We also really liked the color - it was quite versatile and we could use it for various occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Heavenlybliss

customer_reviews.title: Good value, nice color
customer_reviews.text: These bags were just what I wanted for books to be sold at a book fest. The color was nice, and the pale stripes add a bit of interest. I thought they were very good value. I didn't try to load them up. They seemed strong enough for my purposes, but the paper isn't super thick. They arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Belle B

customer_reviews.title: PRB—perfect red bags.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful red bags were pretty and sturdy. I thought the price was perfect. The ones leftover can be used for Valentines Day, July 4th, just about any gifting holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Williams

customer_reviews.title: Picture does not depict stripes
customer_reviews.text: The picture does not show it, but there are stripes on this bag. It is not solid orange. That is not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna K Brown

customer_reviews.title: nice gift bags, arrived quickly and as described.
customer_reviews.text: the paper on these bags was nice, sturdy enough not to rip unless you're over stuffing the bags. perfect for bridal party gifts. arrived as described and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great Color
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for last minute gift giving, anytime of year.. Beautiful color, for any occasion,,,, Shipped well and as described...AAAA++++
customer_reviews.author: Fitzwilly Aircookie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Did not rate 5 stars because they appear darker orange than what is seen in the picture. Used these as party favor bags. They still looked good and did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: 25 pcs for this price is really a good deal.
customer_reviews.text: 25 pcs for this price is really a good deal.. n quality is workable.. its nt the best but not bad either..
customer_reviews.author: Divya

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap thin quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Thin like writing paper. All of the bags came damaged and bent in very poor shape. There was rips on the bottom of multiple bags. Do not reccomend. Went to the dollar tree and bought 12 good quality shiny bags for 12 dollars instead, for goodie bags.
customer_reviews.author: Adina

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: Its a green bag. It held up to carrying several books as gifts. It did what it was supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Captain R. Silverstein

customer_reviews.title: perfect for goody bags
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for goody bags for Mardi Gras Ball tables and they are SUPER NICE... placed my logo in vinyl

customer_reviews.title: Color slightly different
customer_reviews.text: Great bags, put 4 stars because the color is slightly different. Instead of being hot pink as the sample image, they are more like fucsia. But still good paper bags.
customer_reviews.author: mariana

customer_reviews.title: Suoer cute gift bags
customer_reviews.text: Super cute sturdy and well made gift bags. . Make great gift bags or party goody bags. They are roomy and are good medium size gift bag. Love the color. They wrinkle easily, but are paper.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie K

customer_reviews.title: Great black gift bags and strong
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality bags. I was able to stamp my logo on them and embellish these easily.

customer_reviews.title: low quality
customer_reviews.text: The product is low quality. We have lost a few of them when packing. I bought them for a school event award ceremony. We could not line them up on the tables. They did not stand still. we had to put them on their sides.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: These were great. I’ve bought twice now and will continue to do so for every party.

customer_reviews.title: Bags
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the black to use as wedding welcome bags for out of town guests. They do not have reinforced bottoms so be careful using them for anything too heavy.

customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the bag and I used it for gifts like shirts and hats and clothes period

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I used these bags for to put door prizes for a class reunion

customer_reviews.text: I like these bags and use them for many gift-giving ocassions. Wish they were a bit thicker paper and bit stronger. I need to double bag when giving jars of food or anything heavy.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags used for my boutique! They are modern chic and are perfect for the clothing I sell

customer_reviews.title: But a sturdy bag none the less
customer_reviews.text: Was a very muted, not bright orange that I was hoping for. But a sturdy bag none the less.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great gift bags for our wedding gifts to our wedding party. Sturdy and great size.

customer_reviews.text: These were good quality gift bags. I would recommend them. They did not tear when opening and the weight is good...not too thin.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: The bags are durable and thick. Great use for goody bags or lunch baggies.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: What a distintive bag!

customer_reviews.title: Good size for multiple small purchases
customer_reviews.text: Size is perfect and customers love ability to carry multiple small purchases in one bag.

customer_reviews.title: These bags were just perfect for my holiday projects
customer_reviews.text: These bags were just perfect for my holiday projects. I made gift bags this year for the holidays, and these were the perfect weight, color and texture for decorating. The bags were also strong without being too heavy. They worked just great on their own without embellishment, too!

customer_reviews.text: The bags are perfect for our welcome bags for our out-of-town guests for our wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Maria P.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality!! My fiancé and I wanted to make little wedding survivor kits for our hotel guests, and those look nice and sturdy. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Oday M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bags.
customer_reviews.text: Great bags. Worked really well. The handles held up. The bags are not as red as in the picture but more of a brick red. Still love them and they work led great.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Gift or Shopping Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bags for my art business. The size is perfect for small-to-medium sized products and/or for the 8"x10" canvases. The black finish on the product(s) I received is saturated and consistent. The bags were sturdy enough to support my products, but the items I put inside were not heavy or hefty. Overall, these seem like quality bags. I've purchased other products from the Kraft brand in the past, so I am familiar with and trust their quality and standards. These bags look great with our custom company logo stickers affixed (just to give you an idea of how you can tailor your marketing for business use).
customer_reviews.author: Cre8ngLife!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: These bags were great. I was able to pack most orders in them really well. And her bags were cute.
customer_reviews.author: Shershe

customer_reviews.title: great paper gift bag
customer_reviews.text: Loved these bags. The texture (stripe) is very subtle but adds a nice look to the bag. Makes it look much nicer than just a plain, flat color bag. They are strong! We stuffed them with 2 (some with 3) water bottles plus several bags of snacks & candy. The green is a nice "sage" color. Great bag and good price. Arrived quickly, on time as well. The bag does not disappoint!!
customer_reviews.author: betsymuncy

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, filled them up with candy and snacks and they held up well. No broken handles even when kids were swinging the bags around carelessly while full. Do take car while unfolding them up tho as the seams can rip if try opening them carelessly. Slide your hand inside and open from bottom up.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy, colorful
customer_reviews.text: Needed larger bags (~10x8) for children's summer school. These worked so well: strong enough to hold smaller craft projects, booklets & take-home treats; colorful not boring brown; used white labels as 'name tags'. Strong bag with handles is just what was needed, and these were just right !
customer_reviews.author: Moretime

customer_reviews.title: great gift bags
customer_reviews.text: i love the size, the price, the neutral green color that is not themed soecifically for just Christmas or just birthdays or just baby showers or anniversaries. i used it to give thank you gifts. i love that when i put my gifts in i cannot see through the bag like the mesh gift bags i bought (turned out to be see through).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't put anything too heavy in these
customer_reviews.text: I was using these to put books in that I sold. They are okay for one book. Start putting more in and you'll risk them breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Idolfan

customer_reviews.title: Great for gift bags
customer_reviews.text: We used these for goodie bags at a wedding, but will likely hang onto the remainder for gift bags as time goes on. The seams, handles, and paper itself were all pretty sturdy, so they were a good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are very sturdy and durable! They survived cross-country shipping multiple times and not once did anyone complain that they tore. Perfect for gift packing. Great value for the price, too. I'll definitely be buying more when I need them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are STURDY and have a nice deep rich color that doesnt ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are ABSOLUTELY lovely and not your run of the mill cheap paper bags. They are STURDY and have a nice deep rich color that doesnt rub off. THese were made for teens and held up so well to boys tugging and pulling. GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Half of the bags ripped when trying to open them rendering them useless. Wish I had the hindsight to have saved the ripped bags for returning, but no such luck. So I am out the money and the product =(
customer_reviews.author: Angie Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was great for the gifts I had to give friends and coworkers. Textured bag with reinforced handles, I used a hole puncher to attach my bows so the reinforcement was needed. Will buy again next Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But the quality looks good and they look great with the tissue paper
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black bags along with the martini glass tissue paper. I agree with one of the above reviews - they do have a brown hue to them and when held next to a black item you can really see the difference. But the quality looks good and they look great with the tissue paper.
customer_reviews.author: sboyd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for any event
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, the quality and the cost...no way of going wrong by purchasing this item and additional colors. No disappointment here and I'll be back as I'm always planning for something.
customer_reviews.author: Tressa L. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Roomy & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted them to sort my greeting cards: birthday, get well, etc. My small paper bags were thin & worn. These are attractive plus have handles. They do the job nicely.

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy bags!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bags. Bought before & have never been disappointed!! Accidentally got orange instead of red, but that was my error.

customer_reviews.title: Good !
customer_reviews.text: Good ! These doesn’t look cheap and they are sturdy. I got purple bags and the color looks really pretty purple !

product_meta.title: BagDream Gift Bags 8x4.25x10.5Inches 25Pcs Paper Bags, Shopping Bags, Kraft Bags, Retail Bags, Green Stripes Paper Gift Bags with Handles, 100% Recyclable Paper Bags
feature_bullets: PERFECT GIFT BAGS SIZE: 8x4.25x10.5". 110g basis weight kraft paper with a serrated top edge. These bags are made of 100% Recycled Paper. FSC COMPLIANT. Green your life, BagDream paper bags would be your first choice.
GOOD QUALITY. Holding up to 6lbs, all gift bags with paper twist handles are well constructed. No stray glue any where and the solid bottoms can make it stand alone easily.

GREAT GIFT BAG IDEAS. The green kraft bags with tiny stripes could be decorated by drawing, coloring and etc for different holidays as gifts bags to your special ones. Also, you could staple your business card or stamp the outside of the bag with your logo on.
MULTIPLE USES. These green bags are a wonderful medium size for any number of things. Great for holiday gift bags, shopping bags, retail bags, mechandise bags, welcome bags and wedding party bags.
BagDream kraft paper bags are BIO-DEGRADABLE and RECYCLABLE. No peculiar smell and look a lot classier than giving customers those white plastic t-shirt style ones as gifts bags.
